adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: Bedrock-1

model.title: Model
model.description: Model name. Refer to Bedrock's documentation for the list of available models.

aws_access_key_id.title: AWS Access Key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: Provide your AWS Access Key ID

aws_secret_access_key.title: AWS Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: Provide your AWS Secret Access Key

region_name.title: AWS Region name
region_name.description: Provide the AWS Region name where the service is running. Eg. us-east-1

context_size.title: Context Size
context_size.description: The maximum number of context (input) tokens for the model. For setting default in supported models, leave this empty.

max_tokens.title: Maximum Output Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of output tokens to limit LLM replies, the maximum possible differs from model to model.

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries to attempt when a request fails.
